argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2cpm.s | |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | m2cpm.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 3 |  | m2cpm.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | m2cpm.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 5 |  | m2cpmghm.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | m2cpmghm.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 7 |  | m2cpmghm.u | |- U = ( C |`s S ) |
| 8 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 3 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 11 | 1, 5, 6 | #P_cpmatsrgpmat | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> S e. ( SubRing ` C ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> S e. ( SubRing ` C ) ) |
| 13 | 7 | #P_subrgring | |- ( S e. ( SubRing ` C ) -> U e. Ring ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> U e. Ring ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( A e. Ring /\ U e. Ring ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_m2cpmghm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T e. ( A GrpHom U ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 16 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( A GrpHom U ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_m2cpmmhm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` U ) ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( T e. ( A GrpHom U ) /\ T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` U ) ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` A ) = ( mulGrp ` A ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` U ) = ( mulGrp ` U ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_isrhm | |- ( T e. ( A RingHom U ) <-> ( ( A e. Ring /\ U e. Ring ) /\ ( T e. ( A GrpHom U ) /\ T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` U ) ) ) ) ) |
| 23 | 15, 19, 22 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( A RingHom U ) ) |
